Let us, then, bring the lessons of Christ into our practical life, and we shall realize as the fulfillment of the prayer of Christ in all its specifications, "And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it; that the love wherewith thou hast loved me, may be in them, and I in them." Let the mind embrace the largeness of the promise, and contemplate the richness that is expressed. There is no excuse for unbelief. 


                                    Ellen G. White. 


                          -23-
